amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would cut funding from the school lunch or school breakfast programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 233 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 233 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 79.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 233.
Amendment SA 233 proposed by Senator Van Hollen.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 233 proposed by Senator Van Hollen.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 233 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 79.
